items.title: Machine Learning using R and Python
items.headline: Machine Learning using R Programming and Python Programming
objectives_summary: This course has been prepared for professionals aspiring to learn the basics of R and Python to develop applications involving machine learning techniques such as recommendation, classification, and clustering. Through this course, you will learn to solve data-driven problems and implement your solutions using the powerful yet simple programming language R and Python with its packages. After completing this course, you will gain a broad picture of the machine learning environment and the best practices for machine learning techniques.
